channel.title: Rtard Scape.lt Join Now! <sorta off topic not realy tho>
channel.description:
I am currently needing assitance with Rtardex.Lt Im sure the people who have been on my server know that updates are 100% all day all week and i need some expeirenced coders to help with the making.The coders will receive free staff and more alot more just cant say on moparscaape fourms =)
To Sign Up Follow This Link!
http://hellzpk.lightbb.com/index.htm
Available Positions:
Coder:Lolz Coder: Coder: ---------- Tester:Godess ---------- Sponsor: If you wish to be a sponsor please follow this link! [color=red by following this link you agree to everything stated below:
You are not an employee of Moparscape or a Moparscape staff member and are not a family member or acquaintance of the aforementioned.
www.Hellzpk.smfforfree3.com
Have a good day! [/color]

item.title: Rtard Scape.lt Join Now! <sorta off topic not realy tho>
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

[quote=“The Rtard, post:4, topic:125670”]killer dude i never ask for donating money maybe u put wrong site[br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2007, 11:14:26 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Ms Julie link=topic=175880.msg1617663#msg1617663 date=1185012578]
advertising ur site… i dont see enough information to back that up.
[/quote]Lol anyone can advertise there site u just cant advertise your server plus i said off topic so shut the hell up[/quote]

Oh really?

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:1, topic:223”][center][size=14pt]Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org Rules[/size][/center]

[size=12pt]Rule 7:[/size]
We don’t advertise other sites or communities unless we ask and receive permission to and from Moparisthebest. We don’t post links to sites that are not in safe sites list on Moparisthebest.com main page. We never advertise via the PM system. Advertising through the PM system will result in a permanent ban.[/quote]

Note that you did agree to these terms when entering the site…

In any case, your site looks fine. And I might add that I don’t see this as server advertisement…its requesting coders for development

Read full topic
